key_risks: Aging infrastructure requiring significant capital expenditures
Regulatory risks and delays in rate approvals
Climate change and water scarcity impacting operations
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data breach risks
controversies: Ongoing legal disputes, including *Good et al. v. American Water Works*
environmental_issues: Water scarcity and droughts due to climate change
social_issues: Impact of infrastructure upgrades on local communities
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and rate approval challenges

sources.title: American Water Works Company Inc. Data Breach Investigation

The water utility company failed to implement industry standards to protect its customers' data, including encrypting or redacting sensitive information.
